select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from ( select i.released_dtime,i.app_id,i.site_id,i.model_id,i.cat_id,i.is_host,p.pic_id,p.info_id,p.pic_path,p.pic_title,p.pic_note,p.pic_content from cs_info_pic p ,cs_info i where i.id=p.info_id and i.info_status=8 and i.final_status=0 order by p.pic_id asc ) row_ where rownum <=(#{start_num,,jdbcType=INTEGER} + #{page_size,,jdbcType=INTEGER}) ) where rownum_ >=(#{start_num,,jdbcType=INTEGER} + 1)

select top ${page_size} i.released_dtime,i.app_id,i.site_id,i.model_id,i.cat_id,i.is_host,p.pic_id,p.info_id,p.pic_path,p.pic_title,p.pic_note,p.pic_content from cs_info_pic p ,cs_info i where i.id=p.info_id and i.info_status=8 and i.final_status=0 and p.pic_id not in (select top ${start_num} p.pic_id from cs_info_pic p,cs_info i where i.id=p.info_id and i.info_status=8 and i.final_status=0 order by p.pic_id asc ) order by p.pic_id asc
select count(p.pic_id) from cs_info_pic p,cs_info i where i.id=p.info_id and i.info_status=8 and i.final_status=0
